nodes.text: A glowrod, also known as a light-stick, a flashlight, a glowlamp, or a torch, was a portable hand-held device that produced light. The stormtroopers of the Galactic Empire used multi-frequency spotlight glow rods. It allowed its user to see clearer in low-light settings.
When the Spectres boarded a Wookiee gunship, they found that the emergency lights were out, so Kanan Jarrus activated a glowrod to provide them with light.
The Canto Bight Police Department used police glowrods to patrol the coastal city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica.
